title: Toronto Symphony No. 2
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Alan Field and Julian Roffman
brief_description: The third movement of Tchaikovsky’s Sixth Symphony in B minor, played by the Toronto Symphony Orchestra under the direction of its conductor Sir Ernest McMillan. The camera picks out different sections of the orchestra, and some well-known musicians.
creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, Alan Field and Julian Roffman
